alfredsnippet.snippet:
Earl Milton in an address to the SIS, April 1980

"The scientific response to Velikovsky is not an exception: it is a typical example of how science works. When you want to know what science is about, watch what scientists do. Never believe what they say they do! And that's a very important lesson which everybody should dwell upon."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - When You Want to Know What Science Is About, Watch What Scientists Do - Not What They Say
